FAQ.Header.Title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.Header.Subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our hotel management system
FAQ.Question.MakeReservation: How do I make a new reservation?
FAQ.Answer.MakeReservation: To make a new reservation, go to the Reservations section and click 'New Reservation'. Fill in the guest details, select dates, room type, and confirm the booking.
FAQ.Question.ModifyReservation: Can I modify an existing reservation?
FAQ.Answer.ModifyReservation: Yes, you can modify reservations by searching for the booking in the Reservations list, selecting it, and clicking 'Edit'. You can change dates, room type, or guest information.
FAQ.Question.CancelReservation: How do I cancel a reservation?
FAQ.Answer.CancelReservation: To cancel a reservation, find it in the Reservations list, select it, and click 'Cancel'. You can apply cancellation fees according to your hotel policy.
FAQ.Question.CheckIn: How do I check in a guest?
FAQ.Answer.CheckIn: Go to the Front Office section, find the reservation for today's arrivals, and click 'Check In'. Verify guest details, assign room keys, and complete the check-in process.
FAQ.Answer.CheckOut: In the Front Office, go to departures, select the guest, review their folio for any outstanding charges, process final payment, and complete check-out.
FAQ.Question.RoomAssignment: How do I assign rooms to guests?
FAQ.Answer.RoomAssignment: During check-in or reservation modification, you can assign specific rooms based on availability. The system shows real-time room status to help you choose.
FAQ.Answer.ProcessPayment: Go to the Billing section, select the guest folio, choose payment method (cash, card, bank transfer), enter the amount, and process the transaction.
FAQ.Answer.GenerateInvoice: In the Billing section, select the completed folio and click 'Generate Invoice'. You can customize the invoice format and send it via email or print it.
FAQ.Answer.RefundPayment: Yes, go to the payment history, select the transaction to refund, click 'Refund', enter the refund amount and reason, then process the refund.
FAQ.Question.RoomStatus: How do I update room status?
FAQ.Answer.RoomStatus: In the Housekeeping section, you can view all rooms and their current status. Click on a room to update its status (clean, dirty, out of order, maintenance).
FAQ.Question.MaintenanceRequest: How do I create maintenance requests?
FAQ.Answer.MaintenanceRequest: Go to Housekeeping, select the room that needs maintenance, click 'Maintenance Request', describe the issue, set priority, and assign to maintenance staff.
FAQ.Question.CleaningSchedule: How do I manage cleaning schedules?
FAQ.Answer.CleaningSchedule: In the Housekeeping section, you can view daily cleaning tasks, assign rooms to housekeeping staff, and track cleaning progress in real-time.
FAQ.Question.OccupancyReport: How do I generate occupancy reports?
FAQ.Answer.OccupancyReport: Go to Reports & Analytics, select 'Occupancy Report', choose your date range, and generate the report. You can export it as PDF or Excel.
FAQ.Question.RevenueReport: Where can I find revenue reports?
FAQ.Answer.RevenueReport: Revenue reports are available in the Reports section. You can generate daily, weekly, monthly, or custom date range revenue reports with detailed breakdowns.
FAQ.Question.GuestHistory: How do I view guest history?
FAQ.Answer.GuestHistory: In the Reports section, use the Guest History report to view a guest's previous stays, preferences, and spending patterns to provide better service.
FAQ.WelcomeMessage: Hello! I'm here to help you with questions about our hotel management system. Select a category to get started.
FAQ.SelectQuestion: Select a question above to see the answer here.
